resources.string: Would You like to know about Us ?

You Can Play to plan a new Trip by Clicking + icon in the center of Bottom Navigation Bar. After clicking the button Fill-In the Required Information and then, click on Add Trip. In Case, you changed you mind and choose not to add new Trip you can come to back screen by clicking the close(X) icon at the upper left.
Add a new Trip using the + icon in the menu, Fill out the Required Details in adding the new Trip and then click Add Trip button at the top Right
3.View and Keep Track your upcoming trip.
You can choose to invite friend also on your journey and going to buddies section, you can have suggestions and contact way to invite your friends
You will see your upcoming Trips in Schedule menu option. Keep Track of yout upcoming Trips. You can click on Start to get to its location.
